title: Ip loss.
body: I recently bought Xayah with ip for my friend, he also wanted to give it to me but he messed up and bought it for himself at the same time i was gifting him, but since the gifting process was already going i lost my 6300 ip anyway, is there a way for me to get my ip back?

replies.body:
After looking over both of your accounts, here's what happened. 

You were able to successfully gift Xayah to your friend, and he was able to purchase Rakan by himself with IP, not Xayah. We won't be able to give you back that IP since the gift did go through. 

If your friend meant to gift you Rakan instead of buying him for himself, he should be able to hit us up through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help out as long as the champion hasn't been used yet.

But my friend already had rakan,maybe it showed I only gave it to him and he didnt buy it because I gave he received it a couple of seconds after. Idrc about the IP I just dont want that happening to other people in the future. Thanks for your time man :D .
No worries! Thanks for the heads up to beeteedubs, this way I can be on the lookout for others as well ^_^!
